page.title: 02A DAY IN MY LIFE
page.content: I didn't feel like getting up but I knew I had to because it was school.I could hear Jonathan my eldest brother getting dressed and going downstairs for his breakfast. Eventually I persuaded myself to get up.I got my school uniform out of my wardrobe and put it on .Daniel came downstairs just after me so I got his breakfast.Then I went to brush teeth.I heard the front door shut so I knew Jonathan had gone to catch his bus.By now my Mum, Dad and Matthew my youngest brother were ready so we clambered into the car and set off.First of all we dropped my mum off and took Matthew to his babysitter.At 9:00am the bell went and we all went into school.The day passed quickly and it was soon 3.30p.m and time for us to go home and have tea. { }
